subject: Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. owners and players remained in a holding pattern, as a decision by a federal appeals court in St. Louis expected early this week will largely determine what the off-season looks like.
snippet: N.F.L. owners and players remained in a holding pattern, as a decision by a federal appeals court in St. Louis expected early this week will largely determine what the off-season looks like.
